name: Asian Oriental Fusion Cuisine
text:
APPETIZERS
Food Allergy Caution : The safety and satisfaction of our customers is our highest priority. Although precaution is taken to manage the risk of allergen cross contamination in our kitchen, please be advised that there is a possibility of cross contamination occurring during preparation. We do have gluten free, nut free and vegetarian available in our menu. Please asked your server or call regarding any allergies that you may have before ordered.
